text: Phil Hill or Philip Hill or Phillip Hill may refer to: *Philip Carteret Hill (18211894), Premier of Nova Scotia *Phil Hill (19272008), American racing driver, Formula One champion in 1961 *Phillip E. Hill, Sr. (born 1956), American ringleader of a mortgage fraud scheme in the State of Georgia *Phillip Hill (born 1972), American pop punk bass guitar player *Phil Hill (ice hockey) (born 1982), Welsh ice hockey player == See also == * Phillips Hill, Delaware, an unincorporated community * * * * Hill (surname)
title: Philip Hill
